item.title: Scientifica: Switzerland's Premier Science Festival
item.description: Since 2011, Switzerland has been home to Scientifica, the country’s largest science festival, co-hosted by ETH Zurich and the University of Zurich. Held every two years with a unique theme for each edition, Scientifica has consistently drawn over 20,000 visitors. This event provides an exceptional platform for researchers to engage the public through a wide array of activities, including exhibitions and workshops. Highlights from Scientifica23 In the most recent Scientifica event, Scientifica23, the NoCE lab was one of the booths representing the NCCR Evolving Language project.
